name: A Expedição
description:
Help Vasco da Gama arriving in India and win the challenges! (Find all Achievements if you can.)

This game was made for gamejam 365indiesjam and was delivered on August 21, 2016. It was a Brazilian gamejam and the game is all in Portuguese. The theme of the gamejam was: "This should NOT be here".

Controls (How to play):

  • WASD or Arrows -> Movements 
  • Spacebar -> Jump and Action Button
  • Enter -> Attack

Note: Works with keyboard or joystick.

Don't forget to leave your comments.

Thank you for playing and we hope you have some fun.
